conclusion: To determine if the displacements of cars A and B are the same from t=0 to t=t1, we need to analyze their velocity-time graphs.
The displacement of an object is given by the area under its velocity-time graph over a specified time interval.
Car A starts with a velocity of v1 and ends with a velocity of v2 at time t1.
